description:
David Murray has been creating business websites since 1996.  He has used WordPress since its release in May 2003.  WordPress is used to power over 60 million websites. Why – because it is easy to use, powerful and can be adapted to just about any type of business website requirement. 

WordPress websites can be responsive so that they work on a PC, tablet or phone.  It is easy to apply SEO (Search Engine Optimization) techniques to a WordPress website so that they get found by Google.

When you invest in this course you get the benefit of over 20 years website design and SEO experience from David Murray. 

Please check out the free preview videos for this course.
title: WordPress Training Course - Step by step WordPress  tutorial
